title: Post One
content: StoryBots is both a digital learning platform and Emmy Award-winning Netflix series for children centered around curious creatures who live in the world beneath our screens. Armed with a clever concept and product, the StoryBots team approached us to elevate their current design system. Our task was to bring a level of consistency to the StoryBots brand as they grew their reach across web, print, and digital media.
